| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 6 |  | gsumsplit2OLD.f | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsumsplit2OLD.w | |- ( ph -> ( `' ( k e. A |-> X ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) |

| 9 |  | gsumsplit2OLD.u | |- ( ph -> A = ( C u. D ) ) |

| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 11, 7, 8, 9 | #P_gsumsplitOLD | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` C ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` D ) ) ) ) |

| 18 |  | #P_ssun2 | |- D C_ ( C u. D ) |
| 19 | 18, 9 | #P_syl5sseqr | |- ( ph -> D C_ A ) |

| 22 | 21 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` D ) ) = ( G gsum ( k e. D |-> X ) ) ) |
| 23 | 17, 22 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ph -> ( ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` C ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. D |-> X ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 12, 23 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. D |-> X ) ) ) ) |
